#summary Installation of Development Version

=Installation=

==Development==

 # Install Adobe Flash Player ([http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/ Download])
 # Install Visual Studio 2010 (without SQL Express)
 # Install Microsoft Web Platform Installer ([http://www.microsoft.com/web/downloads/platform.aspx Download])
 # Using Microsoft Web Platform Installer select following items to install:
  # SQL Server Express 2008 `R2`
  # SQL Server 2008 Management Studio Express 
  # IIS 7.5
  # Default recommended settings for IIS 7.5
  # ASP.NET MVC 2
 # Install Tortoise SVN
 # Check out from https://iudico.googlecode.com/svn/branches/IUDICO
 # Create folder BasicWebPlayerPackages
 # Change line `<add key="packageStoreDirectoryPath" value="c:\BasicWebPlayerPackages" />` in IUDICO/IUDICO.LMS/web.config to point to correct path to folder BasicWebPlayerPackages.
 # Create database Training using SQL Management Studio
 # Open and run file IUDICO/IUDICO.TestingSystem/Shema/Schema.sql in context of Training database
 # Open IUDICO in Visual Studio and Deploy Database Project
 # Configure IIS 7.5:
  # Create website "IUDICO" with path IUDICO/IUDICO.LMS/
  # Change application pool of website "IUDICO" to .NET 4.0
